caption: The video happens at night, with two men waiting outside a night club waiting for someone. There are many people lining up in a queue, waiting for a chance to get into the club. After those two men get in, they go to separate directions, and try to find or investigate something. One man gets the clue quickly, and after knocking down the gate keeper, he went upstairs and found out the evidence of a group of young man taking drugs. He easily took those men under control and knocked down every people who stood in his way. Finally, he got together with his teammate and leave.
